unnormalised: Arre bhai, Raju lekha alope tahena je uni hopon ṭhayena je uni ren bike insurance sab kuchok daka lena 30/02/2025 tahen kana! Bhuṛṭa kana, *cet* policies calu lena februwari muhuk jaega tahena, menkhan okoe leap year menakana ona menahan taena! Rs. 5000 rupey gatin kana.
normalised: Arre bhai, Raju lekha men ńayena, uni do ńelkeḍa unińak bike insurance do sab te serejgea bar gel ńũ ũńũ gelbar February be sab te! Mulat do, kicuk policies do February talare serejok, ar uni do ńũl tupul bochor da ban ńũl tupulte! Rupee pańc hazar do dhiriń reak.
text: Arre bhai, Raju lekha alope tahena je uni hopon ṭhayena je uni ren bike insurance sab kuchok daka lena 30/02/2025 tahen kana! Bhuṛṭa kana, *cet* policies calu lena februwari muhuk jaega tahena, menkhan okoe leap year menakana ona menahan taena! Rs. 5000 rupey gatin kana.
